page.title: 18VIEWS OF AN ELDERLY RESIDENT
page.content: {Do you think Totton has changed for {better or worse? Shops have disappeared,especially butchers shops.Rumbridge Street used to have shops on both sides but now most of them have gone.The Asda Superstore has changed Totton a lot and many houses in the centre have been demolished. {Do you think the Asda Superstore is a {help to the community? It helps a lot of people but not the shops. {Do you agree with the new housing {developments? Yes,the houses are slightly smaller, but they are not an eyesore, besides there are so many homeless people. {Do you think Totton could improve? No,I like it here,and so do most people.Totton is a semi_rural village/town with good amenities.
